actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to reauthorize the South Florida Geographic Program, and for other purposes.
short_title: South Florida Ecosystem Enhancement Act of 2022

summary.text:
South Florida Ecosystem Enhancement Act of 2022

This bill provides support for ecosystems located within (1) the administrative boundaries of the South Florida Water Management District and adjacent coastal waterbodies, including all coastal water landward of Florida's Coral Reef; and (2) Florida's Coral Reef and the associated patch reef, hard-bottom, and seagrass resources.

titles.title: South Florida Ecosystem Enhancement Act of 2022
South Florida Ecosystem Enhancement Act of 2022
A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to reauthorize the South Florida Geographic Program, and for other purposes.
